title: Assessing When To Share The Gospel | Unapologetic Episode 28
itunes:title: Assessing When To Share The Gospel | Unapologetic Episode 28
description: Every person is at a different stage in their spiritual journey. We look at six stages in assessing spirituality. Welcome to Unapologetic, where we defend truth without comprise with Dr. Bobby Conway, the One Minute Apologist; and host Tim Hull. Assessing When To Share The Gospel. Six Stages To Assessing Spirituality 1. Antagonistic stage - these people resent Christianity 2. Self-Sufficient Stage - these people are spiritually indifferent 3. Seeker Stage - looking for meaning and aware of unmet needs 4. Evaluating Stage - observing Christianity 5. Seeing Stage - clearly understand the gospel 6. Submitting Stage - ready to receive Christs
